course_title: Adult Gerontology Acute Care NP Practicum IV
class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This course focuses on serious acute illness and exacerbation of chronic illness in adults/older adults from a systems perspective. The role of the nurse practitioner as direct care provider, consultant and interdisciplinary team member in acute care settings is discussed.
prerequisites: NRSG 833D and NRSG 834D as prerequisites, NRSG 835D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1585, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: C. Brockett, Status: Open
